de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.net
Class GameInfo

java.lang.Object
  de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.net.Info
      de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.net.GameInfo

public class GameInfo
extends Info

This class holds data about the current state of the game

It contains fields for every info-parameter, the server reports about a specific game.

To avoid confusion between field-names and protocol-paramter-names the naming-scheme follows the scheme used in the client-server protocol

Datatypes used to represent values sent over the wire as strings have been chosen to be the ones a user hopefully might expect.

Nested Class Summary
static class GameInfo.GameStatus
          Represents the values that our representation of a game status can have

          Represents the values that our representation of a trade status can have

mapid

public java.lang.String mapid

name

public java.lang.String name
The name associated with thid id of this game.

gamestatus

public GameInfo.GameStatus gamestatus

The status of this game

The status is represented as a value of GameInfo.GameStatus

turn

public int turn
The current turn of the game.

winner

public Player winner
This field will contain a reference to the Player, that won this game. If the game is still running, and thus no winner has been determined until now, this filed will hold null as its value.

activeplayer

public Player activeplayer
This field will contain a reference to the Player, that is the active player of the game.

activeunitslastaction

public java.lang.String activeunitslastaction
This field will contain the activunitslastaction string as reported by the server.
Note: The datatype of this field should be changed, once the set of possible values has been determined.

tradepartner

public Player tradepartner
This field will contain a reference to the Player, that is the partner in a trade

tradepartnerunit

public Movable tradepartnerunit
This field will contain a reference to the Player, that is the partner in a trade

tradegive

public Inventory tradegive
This field will contains the amount of the items offered in a trade request, as an Inventory

tradeget

public Inventory tradeget
This field will contains the amount of the items demanded in a trade request, as an Inventory

tradestatuslast

public GameInfo.TradeStatus tradestatuslast

The status of the trade request sent most recently.

The status is represented as a value of GameInfo.TradeStatus

playernames

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> playernames
The names of all Players participating in the game.

turnstaken

public java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> turnstaken
The values of the key "turnstaken" as they are reported from the server.
